title: loading is 0% never up ...
body:
After everyone selects their champs and the game is about to start ...
my loading is 0% never up and i see Error for (enternet) but my (Enternet) is Good what i can do ... ~~~~

replies.body: It sounds like your network is failing to establish a connection to the game server, so it can't download assets to get you in-game.  Your best bet would be to use our [connection issues](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) guide as Irrene suggested; however, I recommend going every step to rule out any possibilities.  Hopefully that will get you all fixed up!

I was facing the same problem i followed this article [Here](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues#section-windows) ( focus on two steps : 1. Disable your firewall. 2. Get a wired connection )
There are also a possible solution you can do i did it and actually i don't know if it helped me or what.
after champion select and when the loading screen appears ( this means that the client lol process is active )
open your task manager and go to the ( lol client process location ) and add this file to the firewall exceptions ( This file wasn't mentioned in the troubleshooting article ) this helped me solve this problem..
